name: Masterclasses
longDescription: We provide refreshing insights from experts and captains of industries through innovative, effective, and customized training experiences. Our offerings are strategically segmented for different audiences.

featuresList.title: Customized Curriculum
featuresList.description: Focusing on core topics like Financial Management and Pitching Skills.

featuresList.title: Executive Speaker Series & Clinics
featuresList.description: Delivered by C-suite executives (eg. Deloitte partners) on complex topics like M&A and Advanced Tax Strategy.

featuresList.title: Shark Tank Simulation
featuresList.description: For high stakes pitching and candid feedback.

masterclasses.focus: Core business fundamentals (Financial Management, Pitching Skills).
Advanced and specialized topics (M&A, Advanced Tax Strategy, Strategy & Growth Planning).
